author: Garethjohn3
title: Fantastic hotel in a great location - Review
text: Had a great stay at this hotel. Staff were very friendly and customer focused which was fantastic to see. The room was very clean and stylish with a very comfy bed. The hotel is just a minute away from the subway and about a ten minute walk from times square. Would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone.
